document.full_text: bosnian serb wartime general ratko mladic will face trial on genocide charges in the hague following his arrest in serbia after 15 years on the run, with european officials expecting his extradition within 10 days.
document.title: ratko mladic hunted for massacre to face tribunal
lines_and_colors: bosnian serb wartime general ratko mladic will face trial on genocide charges in the hague following his arrest in serbia after 15 years on the run, with european officials expecting his extradition within 10 days.
